member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache
member.summary: The object that is used by cache-enabled applications for storing and retrieving objects from the cache cluster. An instance of this object is referred to as the cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an object to the cache.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag})
member.summary: Adds an object to the cache. This method enables associating tags with the cached object.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object to a region in the cache.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Adds an object to the cache. This method provides the ability to specify when the object should be expired.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag},System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object to a region in the cache. This method enables association of tags with objects in the cache.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.TimeSpan,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag})
member.summary: Adds an object to the cache. This method enables associating tags with the cached object and specifying when the object should be expired.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object to a region in the cache. This method provides the ability to specify when the object should be expired.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.TimeSpan,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag},System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object to a region in the cache. This method enables associating tags with the cached object and specifying when the object should be expired.
member.returns: A object that represents the version of the object saved to the cache under the key value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddCacheLevelBulkCallback(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheBulkNotificationCallback)
member.summary: Adds a bulk cache notification callback for cache operations occurring on all regions and items.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache bulk notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddCacheLevelCallback(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheOperations,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationCallback)
member.summary: Adds a cache notification callback for cache operations occurring on all regions and items.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddFailureNotificationCallback(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFailureNotificationCallback)
member.summary: Adds a failure notification callback, for notifications indicating that a client has missed one or more cache notifications.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddItemLevelCallback(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheOperations,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationCallback)
member.summary: Adds a cache notification callback for cache operations occurring on one specific item that is not stored in a region.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddItemLevelCallback(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheOperations,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationCallback,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a cache notification callback for cache operations occurring on one specific item that is stored in region.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.AddRegionLevelCallback(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheOperations,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationCallback)
member.summary: Adds a cache notification callback for cache operations occurring on one specific region.
member.returns: A object used to identify the cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.BulkGet(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Returns objects for the specified keys from the specified region of the cache.
member.returns: Returns an object with a list of key and value pairs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.ClearRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes all objects in the specified region.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.CreateRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a region.
member.returns: Returns a value..

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an object from the cache using the specified key.
member.returns: The object that was cached by using the specified key. Null is returned if the key does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Get(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion@)
member.summary: Gets an object from the cache using the specified key. You may also provide the version to obtain a specific version of a key, if that version is still the most current in the cache.
member.returns: The object that was cached by using the specified key. Null is returned if the key does not exist. Even if the key does exist, Null may also be returned because the object has been updated to a new version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an object from the specified region by using the specified key.
member.returns: The object that was cached by using the specified key. Null is returned if the key does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Get(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion@,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an object from the specified region by using the specified key. You may also provide the version to obtain the specific version of a key, if that version is still the most current in the region.
member.returns: The object that was cached by using the specified key. Null is returned if the key does not exist. Even if the key does exist, Null may also be returned because the object has been updated to a new version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetAndLock(System.String,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle@)
member.summary: Locks the key if the key is present and it is not locked and returns the object corresponding to the key.
member.returns: Returns matching the specified key parameter if the is present and is not locked. If the key does not exist, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . Create objects based on the referenced key to resolve this error.If the object is already locked by another cache client, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . The object will be inaccessible until it is unlocked by the locking client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetAndLock(System.String,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lock the key if key is present and it is not locked by any clients and returns the object corresponding to the key.
member.returns: Returns matching the specified key parameter if the is present and is not locked. If the key does not exist, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . Create objects based on the referenced key to resolve this error.If the object is already locked by another cache client, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . The object will be inaccessible until it is unlocked by the locking client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetAndLock(System.String,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle@,System.String)
member.summary: Locks the key if the key is present and is not locked and returns the object corresponding to the key. For objects stored in regions.
member.returns: Returns matching the specified key parameter if the is present and is not locked.If the key does not exist, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . Create objects based on the referenced key to resolve this error.If the object is already locked by another cache client, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . The object will be inaccessible until it is unlocked by the locking client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetAndLock(System.String,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle@,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lock the key if key is present and it is not locked by any clients and returns the object corresponding to the key. For objects stored in regions.
member.returns: Returns matching the specified key parameter if the is present and is not locked.If the key does not exist, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . Create objects based on the referenced key to resolve this error.If the object is already locked by another cache client, a DataCacheException object is thrown with the ErrorCode set to . The object will be inaccessible until it is unlocked by the locking client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetCacheItem(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a object to retrieve all information associated with your cached object in the cluster.
member.returns: A object that contains all information associated with your cached object. Null is returned if the key does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetCacheItem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a object to retrieve all information associated with your cached object in the cluster. For objects stored in regions.
member.returns: A object that contains all information associated with your cached object. Null is returned if the key does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetIfNewer(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion@)
member.summary: Gets an object from the cache, but only if a newer version of the object resides in the cache.
member.returns: If the version in the cache differs from the version parameter, the corresponding cached object is returned. If the version in the cache is the same as the version parameter, null is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetIfNewer(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion@,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an object from the specified region, but only if a newer version of the object resides in the region.
member.returns: If the version in the region differs from the version parameter, the corresponding cached object is returned. If the version in the region is the same as the version parameter, null is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetObjectsByAllTags(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag},System.String)
member.summary: Gets an enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have all the same tags in common.
member.returns: An enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have all the same tags in common.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetObjectsByAnyTag(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag},System.String)
member.summary: Gets an enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have any of the same tags in common.
member.returns: An enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have any of the same tags in common. Null is returned if no objects in the specified region have any of the tags specified.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetObjectsByTag(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheTag,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have the specified tag.
member.returns: An enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region that have the specified tag. Null is returned if no objects in the specified region have the tag specified.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetObjectsInRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region.
member.returns: An enumerable list of all cached objects in the specified region.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetSystemRegionName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the name of the region for the specified key.
member.returns: Returns the region name as a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.GetSystemRegions
member.summary: Used to determine the default regions for the cache.
member.returns: Returns an enumerable list of default regions for the cache as an object.

member.returns: A object that represents the version of the cached object after it has been updated by this method.

member.returns: A object that represents the version of the cached object after it has been updated by this method. The timeout value associated with the cached object overrides expiration settings specified in the named cache configuration. For more information, see Expiration and Eviction.

member.returns: A object that represents the version of the cached object after it has been updated by this method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an object from the cache.
member.returns: Returns true if the object identified by the key is removed. Returns false if the key was not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion)
member.summary: Removes an object from the cache if it is at the specified version.
member.returns: Returns true if the object is removed. Returns false if an object with the specified key and version was not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle)
member.summary: Removes an object from the cache.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an object from the specified region.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheItemVersion,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an object from the specified region if it is at the specified version.
member.returns: Returns true if the object is removed. Returns false if an object with the specified key and version was not found in the region.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Remove(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an object from the specified region.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.RemoveCallback(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationDescriptor)
member.summary: Removes a cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.RemoveRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a region. All cached objects inside the region are also removed.
member.returns: Returns true if the region is removed. Returns false if the region does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.ResetObjectTimeout(System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Resets the object timeout value, defining how long objects reside in the cache before expiring. The value specified for the object overrides the default settings for the cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.ResetObjectTimeout(System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Resets the object timeout value, defining how long objects reside in the region before expiring. The value specified for the object overrides the default settings for the cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Unlock(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle)
member.summary: Releases objects locked in the cache. This method supports pessimistic concurrency by making sure that the appropriate DataCacheLockHandle is used for unlocking the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Unlock(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle,System.String)
member.summary: Releases objects locked in the specified region. This method supports pessimistic concurrency by making sure that the appropriate DataCacheLockHandle is used for unlocking the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Unlock(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Releases objects locked in the cache. This method supports pessimistic concurrency by making sure that the appropriate DataCacheLockHandle is used for unlocking the object. Specifies a new timeout value for the cached object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Unlock(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLockHandle,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Releases objects locked in the specified region. This method supports pessimistic concurrency by making sure that the appropriate DataCacheLockHandle is used for unlocking the object. Specifies a new timeout value for the cached object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCache.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Allows for the use of array notation to access cached objects.
member.returns: A deserialized object that was saved to the cache cluster that uses the key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheBulkNotificationCallback
member.summary: Specifies a callback which is called with a list of cache operations.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory
member.summary: Provides methods to return objects that are mapped to a named cache. This class also enables programmatic configuration of the cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Used for configuring a cache client based on the application configuration file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory.#ctor(Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration)
member.summary: Used for programmatically configuring a cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the object and releases all associated resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory.GetCache(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the cache client, an instance of the object.
member.returns: The cache client, an instance of the DataCache object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactory.GetDefaultCache
member.summary: Returns the cache client corresponding to the default cache, an instance of the object.
member.returns: The cache client, an instance of the DataCache object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration
member.summary: Specifies the configuration settings for a new cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.Clone
member.summary: Create a duplicate DataCacheFactoryConfiguration object.
member.returns: Returns a that can be cast to a object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.ChannelOpenTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time that the cache client waits to establish a network connection with the server.
member.returns: A object..

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.LocalCacheProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the local cache settings for the cache client.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.MaxConnectionsToServer
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of channels to open to the cache cluster.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.NotificationProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the notification settings for the cache client.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time that the cache client waits for a response from the server for each request.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.SecurityProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the security properties for the cache client, which includes the ability to sign and/or encrypt data sent between the client and server.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFactoryConfiguration.Servers
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of objects. Each DataCacheServerEndpoint represents a cache host in the cache cluster.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheFailureNotificationCallback
member.summary: Specifies the parameters required for a method to be invoked by a failure notification when the cache client misses cache notifications.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheInvalidationPolicy
member.summary: Specifies the way locally cached objects should be invalidated.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheInvalidationPolicy.NotificationBased
member.summary: Specifies that objects will stay in local cache until they are automatically invalidated by a cache notification.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheInvalidationPolicy.TimeoutBased
member.summary: Specifies that objects will stay in local cache until their lifetime reaches the localCacheTimeout duration specified in the DataCacheFactory constructor.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties
member.summary: Specifies the local cache settings for a cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.#ctor(System.Int64,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheInvalidationPolicy)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class. This overloaded constructor accepts parameters that configure the properties of local cache.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.DefaultTimeout
member.summary: Gets the default timeout for items in the local cache.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.InvalidationPolicy
member.summary: Gets the invalidation policy for items in the local cache.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether local cache is enabled for the cache client.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheLocalCacheProperties.ObjectCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of objects permitted in the local cache.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationCallback
member.summary: Represents a callback method that is to be invoked by a cache notification when one or more cache operations take place.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationDescriptor
member.summary: Identifies a cache notification callback. This identifier is required to remove the corresponding cache notification callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationDescriptor.ToString
member.summary: Creates a copy of the object.
member.returns: A string value representing the and property values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationDescriptor.CacheName
member.summary: The name of the cache triggering the cache notification.
member.returns: A string value represents the name of the cache triggering the cache notification.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationDescriptor.DelegateId
member.summary: Identifier for the object. Used to distinguish between DataCacheNotificationDescriptor objects.
member.returns: A value used to identify DataCacheNotificationDescriptor objects.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationProperties
member.summary: Specifies the notification settings for a cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationProperties.#ctor(System.Int64,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationProperties.MaxQueueLength
member.summary: Gets the maximum queue length for notifications on the cache cluster.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheNotificationProperties.PollInterval
member.summary: Gets the polling interval that the cache client uses to check for notifications on the cache cluster.
member.returns: Returns .

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheServerEndpoint
member.summary: Used to specify an individual cache host when programmatically configuring the cache client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheServerEndpoint.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to define a cache host in the cache cluster for programmatic configuration of the cache client.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheServerEndpoint.CachePort
member.summary: The cache port on the cache server.
member.returns: A value that represents the cache port number on the cache server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheServerEndpoint.HostName
member.summary: The computer name of the cache server.
member.returns: A string representing the computer name of the cache server.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider
member.summary: A session storage provider that enables Web applications to store session-state data to a distributed cache system.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.CreateNewStoreData(System.Web.HttpContext,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new data storage object for the current request.
member.returns: A SessionStateStoreData object, used for storing session data in the distributed cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.CreateUninitializedItem(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a new session state to the distributed cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.EndRequest(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Called by the SessionStateModule class at the end of a request

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.GetItem(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Boolean@,System.TimeSpan@,System.Object@,System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions@)
member.summary: Returns read-only session-state data from the cache.
member.returns: A SessionStateStoreData object populated with session values and information from the cache

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.GetItemExclusive(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Boolean@,System.TimeSpan@,System.Object@,System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions@)
member.summary: Returns and locks the read-only session-state data from the cache.
member.returns: A SessionStateStoreData object populated with session values and information from the cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes the distributed cache provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.ReleaseItemExclusive(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Releases a lock on the session data in the cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.RemoveItem(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Object,System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData)
member.summary: Deletes session data from the cache.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.SetAndReleaseItemExclusive(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the session item information in the cache with values from the current request and clears the lock on the session item.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.SetItemExpireCallback(System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback)
member.summary: Sets a reference to the SessionStateItemExpireCallback delegate for the Session_OnEnd event defined in the Global.asax file.
member.returns: Cache does not support notification of the expiration; therefore this method always returns false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSessionStoreProvider.ApplicationName
member.summary: The application name. This is used to differentiate sessions in the data source by application.
member.returns: Returns .
